note:
Hi, I'm Aaron Parecki, Senior Security Architect at Okta, and co-founder of
IndieWebCamp.
I maintain oauth.net, write and consult about OAuth, and
participate in the OAuth Working Group at the IETF. I also help people learn about video production and livestreaming and dabble in product design.

I've been tracking my location since 2008 and I wrote 100 songs in 100 days.
I've spoken at conferences around the world about
owning your data,
OAuth,
quantified self,
and explained why R is a vowel. Read more.
name: Aaron Parecki

I've been here 3 days and my @FitBit watch still hasn't figure out that I'm in a new time zone. What good is a watch if it can't tell you the time?? Also there's no way to manually set the timezone. And force syncing it hasn't helped either ü§®

content.html:
This morning I noticed I have a new feature in YouTube called "Go Live Together", an easy way to bring in guests to your livestream. So what better way to test it out than to try it LIVE right now?

Join me and @PhotoJoseph over here in 20 minutes!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=93xaRo4yhnE

content.html: I need to figure out what shenanigans @TripActions pulled with my itinerary that caused the security check to reject my ID, and the @AlaskaAir lounge agent to have an extremely confused look on her face after scanning my boarding pass.

content.html:
The new Sony ZV-1F is a pretty affordable camera that's a great option for using as a dedicated livestreaming camera!

It has clean HDMI out, good autofocus, and importantly, they moved the tripod screw out of the way of the battery door! Check out my latest video for a comparison between the ZV-1 and ZV-1F for livestreaming!

https://youtu.be/ploRr1QmCnM
content.value: The new Sony ZV-1F is a pretty affordable camera that's a great option for using as a dedicated livestreaming camera!  It has clean HDMI out, good autofocus, and importantly, they moved the tripod screw out of the way of the battery door! Check out my latest video for a comparison between the ZV-1 and ZV-1F for livestreaming!  https://youtu.be/ploRr1QmCnM

content.html: so... @AlaskaAir recently redesigned the exterior paint of their planes, and now most of the stock footage on StoryBlocks is out of date. But I'm noticing some other stock websites have more up to date clips. what's going on?

content.html:
Today I worked on budget spreadsheets, planned out all of next year's travel, went grocery shopping at two different stores, restocked the pantry, emptied the dishwasher, and cleaned the sink.

When do I get my adulting trophy?
content.value: Today I worked on budget spreadsheets, planned out all of next year's travel, went grocery shopping at two different stores, restocked the pantry, emptied the dishwasher, and cleaned the sink.   When do I get my adulting trophy?

content.html:
I had no idea these "time since last opened" pill caps were a thing and also so cheap, and now I want to make these for all sorts of different reminders, like

‚Ä¢ when did I last feed the cat?
‚Ä¢ when did I last pump up my bike tires?

content.html:
For the past month, I've had a fragment of a song stuck in my head, and haven't been able to figure out where it's from. The Foundation theme reminds me of it.

Finally, tonight, I remembered it's from a bizarre Swedish commercial I saw years ago.

https://youtu.be/-zCqA483mcg
